profile_positions.description:
Head of Foreign Trade, responsible for ensuring the safe and timely import and export of goods, complying with current regulations, seeking the best cost-benefit ratio, providing effective advice on foreign trade issues to client and affiliate areas and continuous improvement within the team and processes.
Functions:
- To be an AEO account delegate and manage the permits, profiles and commitments of the company in front of Customs.
- To ensure the use of the best options for logistics providers that guarantee supply and security at the lowest cost.
- To define timely action plans on contingencies in the process, providing the most appropriate solutions to supply needs.
- To ensure structured negotiation processes of logistics services, which guarantee the best commercial conditions for the company.
- To ensure compliance in the preparation of settlements and follow-up at the closing of transitory items.
- To approve the savings objective for Special Systems and ensure compliance with its requirements in imports and exports.
- To ensure that the company's foreign trade operations comply with current legal regulations.
- To guarantee the adequate logistic and legal analysis of new import and export projects and provide correct recommendations.
- To ensure the application of the empowerment and productivity system that guarantees the results and the development of the team.
profile_positions.title: Head of Foreign Trade

profile_positions.description:
Head of procurement of the chemical raw materials purchasing specialty of the company, responsible for a budget of 50 billion COP and with a team of 2 people in charge.
Duties:
- To guarantee the supply of materials in the quantities and dates defined by Planning department through its own execution and effective and permanent monitoring of the team in charge.
- To know the market conditions, cost structures and manufacturing processes of the materials in charge, as well as keep updated on the matter.
- To lead and execute strategic negotiations with suppliers of the materials in charge looking for the best commercial conditions.
- To search and permanently develop supply alternatives and savings plans that improve supply and profitability through its own execution and effective and permanent monitoring of the team in charge.
- To anticipate critical supply situations and lead their solution, in conjunction with the Planning, R&D, Quality and Production departments.
- To build and mantain transparent and long-term relationships with specialty suppliers.
- To guarantee the definition, documentation and periodic execution of the monitoring methodology for national and international market variables (price, supply, demand, raw materials, economy of scale) that affect the purchase prices of the materials in charge.
- To know, comply and ensure the compliance of the procurement department procedures and propose their permanent improvement.
- To guarantee a competent, productive, constantly developing work team, emotionally connected and aligned with the company culture.
profile_positions.title: Head of Procurement Chemicals

profile_positions.description:
Head of Procurement of the company's indirect purchasing specialty (industrial and general supplies, and marketing / Point-of-Purchase tools), responsible for a budget of USD 6 million and in charge of a 6 people team.
Duties:
- To lead and execute strategic negotiations of indirect purchases looking for the best commercial conditions.
- To lead and ensure the solution of critical supply situations, through joint work with client areas (Maintenance, General Services, Marketing) and the team in charge.
- To sarch and develop alternative suppliers that allow competitiveness in prices, quality and supply for indirect purchases through effective and permanent monitoring of the team in charge.
- To prepare the annual budget of the indirect purchases, forecasting the price variations of the items in charge after analyzing the macroeconomic conditions and behavior of the commodities that impact the cost structures of the items.
- To detect opportunities for improvement in the processes and tools of the area and manage their updating.
- To guarantee the constant training and empowerment of the team in charge.
profile_positions.title: Head of Procurement Indirect Purchasing

company.description:
“Because we care”, tocamos a vida de centenas de milhares de pessoas todos os dias. Inspiramos soluções inovadoras e sustentáveis para os mercados de alimentos, farmacêuticos, cuidados pessoais e industriais em todo o mundo. Nossas soluções, cuidadosamente adquiridas e customizadas para especificações exatas sempre que necessário, são apoiadas por pesquisa e desenvolvimento, atendimento ao cliente e suporte técnico e regulatório, garantindo que atendam às necessidades determinadas com precisão em cada estágio da cadeia de valor.

Em toda a Europa, América Latina, América do Norte e Ásia-Pacífico, nossos aproximadamente 2.600 funcionários fazem seu melhor dia após dia para entregar soluções de valor agregado para nossos clientes. Em nossas atividades, abraçamos os princípios da sustentabilidade, projetando produtos, serviços e processos com esses princípios em mente. Da formulação à entrega, do ingrediente à embalagem, da representada ao cliente, nos preocupamos com cada detalhe do que fazemos. 
Porque cada detalhe está ao nosso cuidado. Para mais informações, www.caldic.com
